items.title: Russian official threatens Zelenskyy as Moscow claims Kyiv attacked Putin residence
items.description: A top Russian official on Monday issued personal threats against Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

items.title: WATCH:  Good Samaritan speaks out after rescuing couple from crash
items.description: An Air Force staff sergeant and other good Samaritans rushed to save a couple after their vehicle spun off the road, clinging to the edge of a steep e...

items.title: Flu cases on the rise amid holiday travel, gatherings, latest CDC data shows
items.description: Flu activity is increasing across the U.S. amid holiday travel and gatherings, according to the latest data from the CDC.

items.title: Sheriff releases dash cam video that may show missing 19-year-old girl
items.description: Newly obtained dashboard camera video may show a Texas teenage girl on Christmas Eve right as she went missing, authorities announced.

items.title: WATCH:  'It sounds like a dragon': Bear living under house won't leave
items.description: A homeowner in Altadena, California, says it's terrifying to have the bear live in the crawl space under his home.
